author: Brenda Goh
title: Recovered, almost: China's early patients unable to shed coronavirus
description: Dressed in a hazmat suit, two masks and a face shield, Du Mingjun knocked on the mahogany door of a flat in a suburban district of Wuhan on a recent morning.
content:
WUHAN, China (Reuters) - Dressed in a hazmat suit, two masks and a face shield, Du Mingjun knocked on the mahogany door of a flat in a suburban district of Wuhan on a recent morning. 
A man wearing a single mask opened the door a crack and, after Du introduc… [+8321 chars]
